value.title: Register an Azure AD app to Embed Power BI Content and Apply Permissions within Azure AD| Part 3
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI Embedded Step by Step series. Myself Dhruvin Shah. The entire series is dedicated to the Intermediate level of Power BI folks. The series covers step by step guide to embed the Power BI report in any third-party custom application or SaaS application. During this video, first we will

value.title: Relative Time Slicer in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this session, we will discuss the new feature rolled out during the April 2020 Update of Power BI Desktop.  Now, we can add  Time Slicer with the OOTB date filter in Power BI.   With Relative Time Slicer, we can filter data based on the time.  Sometimes there are situations, where we need to filter

value.title: Show/Hide Multiple Data Values using TME AG Toggle Switch – Custom Visual – Toggle Switch by TME AG
value.excerpt: During this session, we will explore one of the custom visuals in Power BI which is TME AG Toggle Switch in Power BI.   Sometimes, we need to show/hide data values based on Toggle Switch. Let’s consider one real-life example where we need to show Weekend and Weekday data. I want to provide one switch

value.title: Sort a table using Multiple Columns in Power BI | Multi Column Sort in Power  BI
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will learn, how we can sort a tale using multiple columns for the table visualization in Power BI.  This feature has been rolled out in March 2020 Power BI Desktop Update.  Here, first we will learn how we can create apply a sort for the multiple column. Then we will change the sort

value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.  This came up as I get pinged a lot from folks wondering how they can use AAD with Power BI, not necessarily realizing that it is already there.  http://blogs.technet.com/b/powerbisupport/archive/2015/09/15/azure-active-directory-and-power-bi.aspx

value.title: Bulk Assign Licenses in Office 365
value.excerpt: You may need to assign an O365 License to multiple users.  I show you how to do a bulk assign to multiple users.  With looking at the upcoming Power BI GA, this may be handy for assigning multiple Free licenses to your users, or Pro licenses.  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: Case of the Broken Power BI Incremental Refresh
value.excerpt: Are you using Power BI incremental refresh? Have you had it not work even though you set everything up? In this video, Patrick looks at a scenario where Power BI incremental refresh was broken. He then looks at a way to get Power BI incremental refresh working properly.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube

value.title: Configure data sources for Power BI Reports in Power BI Report Server
value.excerpt: In this video, I show you how you can configure the data source of a Power BI report within Power BI Report Server. This comes in really handy when you want to get around the Kerberos Constrained Delegation requirements and avoid having to configure kerberos - which can be a pain.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy
